name: Holiday Inn Vilnius

reviews.text: I stayed at the Holiday Inn Vilnius while on a business trip. I stayed on the Executive floor and was pleasantly surprised with the amenities and services that this hotel offers. The room has all the facilities that a traveller on business would require. Spacious work desk, free wireless internet (very fast too!), Safe, tea/coffee making facilities, well stocked mini bar, iron & ironing board, trouser press etc. The rooms are well furnished and maintained in an immaculate condition considering that the hotel is not new. The bathroom is spotless and is well stocked with amenities like shampoo, bath foam, shoe mitt, comb etc etc of a a very good quality.
reviews.title: Great Value for money at a branded hotel!!!

reviews.text: The hotel has a fitness room which though small, is accessible 24/7 and hence very convenient for business travellers who could use it at a time of their convenience. The food & beverage selection both in the restaurant and room service is extensive and I must admit of a high quality not generally found in hotel restaurants.
reviews.title: Excellent Business Hotel with very good service and reasonable price

reviews.text: The staff at the hotel both at the front desk as well as the food service are always smiling and helpful, guess they are well treated by the Management particularly in these adverse economic times!!!
reviews.title: Reasonably good value with some caveats

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is stone's throw from the business district and is ideal for a visitor on business who would not need to take a taxi or spend time in the traffic jams of Vilnius. The old town too is just a short walk away.
reviews.title: Decent business-type hotel but a little out of town and watch for overcharging

reviews.text: We stayed on the Executive Floor, the rooms are very nice as well the bathroom. Internet service was for free and the service was what I expect from a good business hotel. The price is very reasonable, when you compare with other hotels in Vilnius. I can warmly recomment the hotel.
reviews.title: A very good Holiday Inn at a 15-min. walk from the medieval Old Town

reviews.text: I spent four nights at the Holiday inn in Vilnius last November and have pretty much nice things to say about it.
reviews.title: Nice hotel

reviews.text: As other reviewers have said, it is not located in the old town but it is a pleasant 10-15 min walk to get there. For those who don't feel like it there are plenty of buses that stop almost right outside the hotel and can take you there.
reviews.title: Nice hotel

reviews.text: I got a room on a high floor with a view...well of the nearby buildings mostly, but in the distance one can see the Cathedral and the old town which was nice. The room itself, while comfortable, clean and roomy, was nothing really special. Same goes for the bathroom, except of course for the heated floor which was a nice feature.
reviews.title: fair value but not up to Holiday Inn standards

reviews.text: I did not have breakfast or used the restaurant but I did order room service a couple of times and cannot say I was impressed...Last I do have to mention the front desk staff which was efficient and helpful and probably the only smiling faces that you will meet in Vilnius...
reviews.title: Very pleasant hotel

likes.liked: — Quiet, modern, comfortable rooms, heated bathroom floor

reviews.text: Stayed here for 3 nights. the hotel is located on the other side (North) of the river, meaning a 15-20 min talk to the town hall/old town.
reviews.title: Great hotel in good location

reviews.text: Went there for a meeting. Excellent service, nice buffet breakfast and meals. Short walk to the historic city centre (about 10 minutes). Good affordable restaurant close to the hotel (in a castle-like building). Would stay there again. No coffeemaker in room.
reviews.title: Good Value for money

reviews.text: I stayed at the Holiday Inn while on a business trip.
reviews.title: I liked to stay in Holiday Inn Vilnius

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are of a decent size and well furnished. The bathroom is spotless and so is cleanliness in the hotel in general.
reviews.title: comfortable stay for a nice price

reviews.text: The hotel offers free high speed internet access, ideal for a business traveler. There is a wide selection of food and beverage in the restaurant as well as in the room service menus.
reviews.title: Comfortable, clean and.........warm!

reviews.text: The staff is friendly and helpful and provides helpful tips on sightseeing, leisure activities etc.
reviews.title: Value for money.

reviews.text: Stayed here for two nights. As PC Platinum member I was upgraded into one of the seventh floor executive rooms, which was cosy, clean and nice. Had everything I could wanna use. The bathroom floor was heated. The internet (which is free) was very slow at the first day, but improved on the second. TV selection was ok, hotel is cca. 1km from the old town, easily walkable distance. Paid 60 Litas for the taxi from the airport.
reviews.title: Hidden gem

reviews.text: Ammenities seemed fine to start with until logging on to internet. Did not work so tried to phone reception, phone did not work so settled for TV...you guessed it. TV did not work on 2nd and 3rd floors. Little concern from the receptionist but on checking out was given a 10% discount which wasn't much of a consilation when on business...will find an alternative hotel next time.
reviews.title: Not up to Holiday Inn standard

reviews.text: Not a bad hotel just far below the quality at other Holidays Inns I stayed at recently like Beijing And Chengdu
reviews.title: Below average for Holiday Inn and a 15-20 min walk to the Center

reviews.text: PRO Free Internet was a plus
reviews.title: Good value

description: The Holiday Inn Vilnius hotel, one of the newest and biggest hotel in Vilnius is located in the centre of the city, on the right bank of the river Neris, just a 10 minutes walk to the old town. This historical heart of Vilnius can be seen from your room window! The Holiday Inn Vilnius hotel offers 134 thoughtfully appointed guest rooms. All rooms have soundproof windows, wired and wireless High Speed Internet Access and are equipped with satellite TV, and in-house movies. The hotel offers sauna facilities and free mini-gym f or all in-house guests. With state-of-the-art conference facilities, natural daylight and air-conditioning, the multifunctional meeting roomshosting up to 350 persons , provide an ideal venue for any conference or private event. Restaurant Terra El Dorado offers national and international cuisine.
